<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">      for (User &#42;U : F.users())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">        if (isa&lt;CallInst&gt;(U))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">        localSumFreq += getNumOfCalls(&#42;Caller, F);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">      if (localSumFreq &gt;= MaxFreq)</Highlight></CodeLine>
